bio: A rare Abodabat in temporary housing. Once a year, if you're lucky, you can see him change houses.

soultimate.name: Belfree Blues
soultimate.inspiritEffects: Drop foe's movement speed by 50% and Move Meter speed by 30% for 20 seconds.
soultimate.description: Attack to decrease foes' speed for a time.

skill.effect: Temporarily go into Secrecy when in danger.
skill.name: Lay Low

name: Belfree
